user_question: What are the latest advancements in tennis racket technology and generate an image of a futuristic tennis racket?
final_answer: Latest advancements in tennis racket technology include smart rackets with sensors for tracking performance, rackets made from graphene for enhanced strength and flexibility, and rackets with adjustable balance points. Image of a futuristic tennis racket generated. Recent innovations in tennis ball technology include pressureless tennis balls and eco-friendly balls made from recycled materials.
